name: Bridge (itch)
description:
Bridge follows the journey of a man who has been trapped in a terrifying realm by a demonic entity.  This realm is devoid of colour and joy, and his only escape, he is told, is to seek the Bridge.  The Bridge is a beacon of hope and light.

...

Yet no one has ever seen it, so where does he begin?

Gameplay - The gameplay in Bridge is primarily story-based, with a few puzzles strewn into the mix here and there.   It is best told through experience, so I will be brief in my descriptions.

Dark Themes - This game is dark and depressing, and is filled with unnerving imagery.  Nothing graphic, but keep in mind that the scariest things in this world are those we cannot see.  Keep that in mind before playing

Playtime - is roughly an hour, and I recommend sitting through the whole thing in one session.  It'll leave a greater impact.

Soundtrack - https://toxicsasquatch.bandcamp.com/album/bridge-ost

IMPORTANT: ***Menu controls are WASD / Arrow Keys  

+ E/Space/Z to select***!
